tool_description: The API accepts user input in the form of a question or query and processes it using advanced NLP algorithms. It handles various question types, including factual, descriptive, and inferential questions.  Contextual Understanding: The API is designed to understand the context of the question by analyzing the provided query along with any accompanying information or context. This enables it to generate accurate answers that are contextually relevant.
name: stilesChat AI
title: stilesChat AI

api_list.name: chat
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stileschat-ai.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stileschat-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stileschat-ai.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stileschat-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
